pageContext.claim: “With so much talk about the Wall, people are losing sight of the great job being done on our Southern Border by Border Patrol, ICE and our great Military. Remember the Caravans? Well, they didn't get through and none are forming or on their way. Border is tight. Fake News silent!”
pageContext.analysis: While Trump claims "the border is tight," the number of people arrested or denied entry along the Mexico border reached a new high for the Trump presidency in November, according to Homeland Security figures, as arrests of juveniles and parents with children continued to rise. Trump previously had touted a decline in arrests as a sign of progress, but changed his tune when apprehensions started to rise. Trump suggests that no one in the caravan got past the border but that's not true.
